intro: Hi! Welcome to my personal website.
This space is all about showcasing who I am, what I do, and what I enjoy.
Feel free to look around, explore the tabs above, and reach out if you’d like to connect.

uw.description: I’m currently a Computer Science student at the University of Wisconsin–Madison.

contact.message: Feel free to reach out—whether it’s for collaboration, questions, or just to say hello.
